channel.title: CVE Feed for WhatsApp -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WhatsApp -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-1910|2024-08-04T06:53:59.731Z -- whatsapp -- whatsapp%20business%20for%20android
item.description: A missing bounds check in WhatsApp for Android prior to v2.21.1.13 and WhatsApp Business for Android prior to v2.21.1.13 could have allowed out-of-bounds read and write if a user applied specific image filters to a specially crafted image and sent the resulting image.
